product_name: The North Face Carina Wind Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cool, blustery days don't stand a chance against the bright colors and weather-resistant protection of The North Face Carina Wind jacket for girls. Wind- and water-resistant polyester exterior provides lightweight coverage and protection in mild weather. Hood ensures complete coverage; elastic hem, cuffs and hood help seal in warmth. The North Face Carina Wind jacket features handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Cool, blustery days don't stand a chance against the bright colors and weather-resistant protection of The North Face Carina Wind jacket for girls.
